title: Steps to Ascension: Guides Readers to Building Enhanced Connection to Spirit
text:
Sydney Francis' new book discusses key information received from celestial guides
NEW YORK (PRWEB) October 22, 2015
In the new spiritual book “Steps to Ascension: A Path to Inner Awareness” (published by Balboa Press), author Sydney Francis shares powerful tools and guidance for readers who desire to increase their ability to find and maintain a higher level of spiritual awareness and connection. “‘ Steps to Ascension ,’” explains Francis, “is the outcome of my promise to otherworldly guides who advised me to share this information with as many as possible.”
For more than 30 years, Francis has practiced meditation, eventually receiving guided information through channelings from celestial guides . Their powerful information allowed her to understand the importance of an enhanced connection to Spirit, and gave her the specific steps necessary to prepare for this connection through the focused use of meditation and sleep.
“Also included,” shares Francis, “are verbatim Quote: s from some of the channeling sessions in which my guides clarified and underscored for me the essential role the Earth plays in the universe.” She illustrates the guidance given regarding the building of spiritual balance and strength, and how the incorporation of these steps will cause profoundly positive and lasting effects on the general populace, which she says in turn will cause a rebalancing and stabilization of the Earth.
Throughout “Steps to Ascension,” Francis provides readers with the inspirational information she has learned in the hopes that they will develop the spiritual strength necessary to participate fully in the rebalancing and fortification of the Earth.
“Steps to Ascension”

About the Author
Sydney Francis has lived a life of remarkable timing and profound synchronicity. From narrowly avoiding death numerous times in Ghana, West Africa, to escaping death in a highway accident with the help of a mysterious “angel,” her life has been anything but ordinary. These many experiences compelled her to build her spiritual capacity and “Steps to Ascension” is an outward manifestation of some of the profound teachings she has received.
